pullRequest.title: AIX JDK11 System.mapLibraryName() returns libraries with .a suffix
pullRequest.bodyText:
AIX JDK11 System.mapLibraryName() returns libraries with .a suffix
AIX JDK11 returns same native library suffix .a as JDK8 while JDK14+ match hotspot output .so.
Reviewer: @DanHeidinga
Signed-off-by: Jason Feng fengj@ca.ibm.com

nodes.bodyText:
I don't think we want to change 14 at this point.  Based on my understanding, 15 is the earliest release we may have to change if the alternativeLibraryName doesn't work.
Let's remove the version check for the 0.21.0 release and address in the jdk15 release.  If the check is needed for 15 to build, then we can make it <= 14 for the time being

commit.message:
AIX JDK11 System.mapLibraryName() returns libraries with .a suffix

AIX JDK11/14 returns same native library suffix .a as JDK8 while JDK15+
match hotspot output .so.

Signed-off-by: Jason Feng <fengj@ca.ibm.com>
